quote_last: , when Septimus was closing the file on the last claim for the day, his immediate superior, the deputy manager, called him in for a consultation.
title: Broken Routine
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last:
“Strasvetye,” came a voice behind Eva. “Kak pazhavatye.”
She whirled around. Moving in fast was a tall and — admit it — not bad-looking Soviet major.
title: Project Daedalus
author: Thomas Hoover
